statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM CustomerOrders
SELECT order_date, customer_name, shipping_address FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT order_id, customer_name FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM CustomerOrders WHERE shipping_address LIKE 'New York%';
SELECT order_date, customer_name, shipping_address FROM CustomerOrders WHERE order_date >= '2021-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name FROM CustomerOrders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerOrders WHERE customer_name IN ('Alice', 'Bob', 'Charlie');
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, shipping_address FROM customers WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, status FROM customers INNER JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_name, shipping_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.status = 'Shipped';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE orders.status = 'Pending' ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_orders > 2;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000;
SELECT * FROM shipping WHERE shipping_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, order_total FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, order_total, shipping_date, address FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN shipping ON orders.order_id = shipping.order_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_date, total_amount FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT order_id, shipment_date, tracking_number FROM Shipments WHERE shipment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, order_date, tracking_number FROM Customers INNER JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id INNER JOIN Shipments ON Orders.order_id = Shipments.order_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, shipping_address FROM customers JOIN shipments ON customers.customer_id = shipments.order_id;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price <= 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_address, delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
